availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Frederick Volkins (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, tavern keeper.)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, tavern keeper. Native of Germany. Married to Matilda Goss Volkins in Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, on April 25, 1857. Tavern keeper in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 165.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film 000482708.
"Frederick Volkins (1826-1873)," Find A Grave, Memorial 100603923, accessed February 28, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/100603923.
